item.title: IndieWeb Summit 2019 - Day 1 Review
item.description: The IndieWeb organization decided against youtube this year, and I can understand why. However, Twitch is not easy to embed from, and youtube offers autotranscription, which is very useful and relies on sophisticated AI.. not something I can spin up from a BASH shell. So I grabbed the audio from twitch and converted to mp4 with ffmpeg and put it on youtube, so I could take advantage of the easy embed, and autotranscription.
